sentences.english: Detailed analysis to the pump sending system of the concrete pump has carried on.
sentences.chinese: 混凝土泵泵送系统油缸的换向平顺性问题。

sentences.english: There is a large amount of energy wasted due to the fraction of commutator.
sentences.chinese: 换向器引起的摩擦损耗了大量的能量。

sentences.english: Flame changeover is an important component in the production process of glass kiln.
sentences.chinese: 火焰换向是玻璃窑炉生产工艺中的一个重要组成部分。

sentences.english: A high-reliability air-actuated direction valve is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种工作高度可靠的换向气阀。

sentences.english: The paper analyses the commutation processes in polyphase brushless DC generators.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了多相无刷直流发电机的换向过程。

sentences.english: Suppose that both the regulating handle and the reversing handle are at the stop position.
sentences.chinese: 假设调节手柄和换向手柄都在停止位置。

sentences.english: Each period of DC excitation and forced commutation drives is set with an external capacitor.
sentences.chinese: 直流励磁时间和强制换向时间都由一个外部电容设定。

sentences.english: K25JD-BW series is plate fitting shut-off directional valves 5/2 way.
sentences.chinese: BW系列是二位五通板接截止式换向阀。

sentences.english: Move the reversing handle to the ahead side and to the astern side alternatively.
sentences.chinese: 移动换向手柄到正车侧和倒车侧交变地。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an end-face sealed manual three-position four-way reversing rotary valve.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种端面密封手动三位四通换向转阀。

sentences.english: K25JK-BW series is plate fitting shut-off directional valves 5/2 way.
sentences.chinese: BW系列是二位五通板接截止式换向阀。

sentences.english: Multi—way valve manually control, smooth movements, system reliability.
sentences.chinese: 手动多路换向阀控制，动作平稳，系统可靠。

sentences.english: And it's realized that the scraping is in continuous way and timer by two changing direction systems.
sentences.chinese: 通过两套换向系统实现连续或定时刮泥。

sentences.english: There are sparks at the commutator. Please find out the trouble and put it right.
sentences.chinese: 换向器上有火花，请找出故障并排除它。

sentences.english: Variable magnetic pole DC motor can resolve the problem of commutator existing in the traditional DC motor.
sentences.chinese: 变磁极性直流电机解决了传统直流电机的换向器问题。
